entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:55 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
